lines.text: It must be fun wearing the same shirt every day.
Say, you're late for your lesson.
Yeah, well a couple of chickens had me cornered by the barn down there.
lines.character: Elly Jordan, aka Wyoming Steve Gibson

lines.text: Yeah, I was on the way up and coming around the barn, there were those doggone chickens and they wouldn't let me by.
lines.character: Elly Jordan, aka Wyoming Steve Gibson

lines.text: Too bad you don't carry a gun, you could've shot your way out.
Well now, heck, Jane, that's nothing to kid a fella about. You should've seen the dirty looks they were giving me.
lines.character: Elly Jordan, aka Wyoming Steve Gibson

lines.text: Now listen Roy, are we gonna die laying down?
Somebody figure out a new way to do it?

[to Sam]
When I was your age, I didn't let any city slicker steal my gal from under my nose.
